hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cp -a /var/lib/jenkins/myemsl2/myemsl2/trunk/* . cp -a /var/lib/jenkins/myemsl2/myemsl2/trunk/.svn . export CREATEREPOOPTS= export MOCKDISTPREFIX= export REPODIR=/var/lib/jenkins/"$DIST"/ if [ "$DIST" = "epel-5-x86_64" ]; then export CREATEREPOOPTS='-s sha'; fi if [ -f /etc/pacifica/jenkins.sh ]; then . /etc/pacifica/jenkins.sh; fi bash autogen.sh make dist mkdir -p packages/"$DIST"/srpms mkdir -p packages/"$DIST"/bin make MOCKDIST="$MOCKDISTPREFIX$DIST" mock cp -a packages/"$MOCKDISTPREFIX$DIST"/bin/* "$REPODIR" createrepo $CREATEREPOOPTS "$REPODIR"
